parameters.name: AcceleratorId
parameters.description: The ID of the GA instance.

parameters.name: CertificateId
parameters.description: The ID of the replacement certificate.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the value, but you must make sure that the value is unique among different requests. The client token can contain only ASCII characters.

> If you do not specify this parameter, the system automatically uses the value of **RequestId** as the value of **ClientToken**. The value of **RequestId** for each API request may be different.

parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The domain name associated with the additional certificate that you want to replace.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to perform a dry run. Valid values:

*   **true**: performs a dry run. The system checks the required parameters, request syntax, and limits. If the request fails the dry run, an error message is returned. If the request passes the dry run, the `DryRunOperation` error code is returned.
*   **false:** performs a dry run and sends the request. If the request passes the dry run, a 2xx HTTP status code is returned and the operation is performed. This is the default value.

parameters.name: ListenerId
parameters.description: The ID of the listener. Only HTTPS listeners are supported.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the GA instance is deployed. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.
